item.description:
Bring your entire family to enjoy Festival Fete’s Holiday Market on Thanksgiving Weekend at the Rhode Island Convention Center. Over 125 art and craft artisans, festive food, a farmer’s market sponsored by Whole Foods Market, visits with Santa, free giftwrapping, Children’s Creation Station and strolling merriment to include RI’s own Big Nazo, Mime-a lot and Matthew the Balloon Man.

Best of all, our own main organizer R. Elsbeth Todd will be there sporting her art!

Tickets for Festival Fete's Holiday Market are $5 in advance, and children under 12 are FREE. Order your ticket(s) in advance! You will receive confirmation for your order and we will mail them to you directly.

You can purchase tickets at the following:

http://festivalfete.com/

Here's the plan:

You are on your own when it comes to purchasing tickets.  I am sure there will be tickets available at the door, so for those of you uncertain up till the last minute, you have ample opportunity to decide. 

You are more than welcome to show up as you like, the event goes till 6 pm.  I am likely to get there around 11 am and go straight on inside, stay for a few hours.  Rather than culminating as a group, I encourage everyone to come as they are, but if you're looking for someone to shop with, then by all means, come find me if you'd like via the blue-and-white "Cat in the Hat" hat.  The main and most important thing for you is to have a great time. 

I look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm assuming a packed house, so I'll be sporting a blue-and-white "Cat in the Hat" hat
item.name: Festival Fete's Holiday Market
